Package simu.model

Class CustomerVisual

java.lang.Object
simu.model.CustomerVisual
public class CustomerVisual extends Object
Represents the visual representation of a customer in the simulation. Contains properties needed for rendering a customer on the canvas, including position, color, and identifying information.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new visual representation of a customer.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerVisual

      public CustomerVisual(int id, CustomerType type, int items)
      Creates a new visual representation of a customer. Assigns a color based on the customer type - red for express customers, blue for regular customers.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the customer
      type - The type of customer (regular or express)
      items - The number of items the customer is purchasing
